mapper.select: select STORE_NO , STORE_NAME , STORE_CATEGORY , STORE_SCORE , LIKE_COUNT from STORE where STORE_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%') order by LIKE_COUNT DESC;

select STORE_NO , OWN_NO , STORE_NAME , STORE_TEL , STORE_LOCATION , STORE_CATEGORY , STORE_INFO , STORE_PLUS , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(STORE_TIME, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_TIME , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(STORE_BT, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_BT , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(STORE_LO, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_LO , SOTRE_CLOSE , STORE_SCORE , LIKE_COUNT from STORE where STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};
select MENU_NO , STORE_NO , MENU_NAME , FORMAT(MENU_PRICE, 0) MENU_PRICE , MENU_HIDE , MENU_INFO from MENU where STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};
select SEAT_NO , STORE_NO , SEAT_NAME , SEAT_USETIME , SEAT_MIN , SEAT_MAX , SEAT_CONTENT , SEAT_OC from SEAT where STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};
